languages.text: "Изгой Ирлиэт, я приберег для тебя благую весть. Нашим провидцам удалось связаться с детьми мира-корабля Алайтока, и вскоре твои собратья-изгои посетят эту часть галактики, что мон-кай прозвали Простором. Заберут нас с собой, подарят новый дом и..." {n}Шайрэнкхей задерживает взгляд на вас, задумавшись, стоит ли продолжать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Изгой Ирлиэт, я приберег для тебя благую весть. Нашим провидцам удалось связаться с детьми мира-корабля Алайтока, и вскоре твои собратья-изгои посетят эту часть галактити, что мон-кай прозвали Простором. Заберут нас с собой, подарят новый дом и..." {n}Шайринкай задерживает взгляд на вас, задумавшись, стоит ли продолжать.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Изгой Ирлиэт, я приберег для тебя благую весть. Нашим провидцам удалось связаться с детьми мира-корабля Алайтока, и вскоре твои собратья-изгои посетят эту часть галактики, что мон-кай прозвали Простором. Заберут нас с собой, подарят новый дом и..." {n}Шайрэнкхей задерживает взгляд на вас, задумавшись, стоит ли продолжать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Exile Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our seers managed to contact the children of craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow exiles will visit the part of the galaxy called the Expanse by the mon-keigh. They will take us away, give us a new home and..." {n}Shairenkhei maintains his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

languages.text: «Proscrita Yrliet, te traigo buenas noticias. Nuestros videntes han logrado contactar con los hijos del mundo astronave Alaitoc, y pronto tus camaradas proscritos visitarán esta parte de la galaxia que los mon-keigh llaman "la Extensión". Nos evacuarán, nos darán un nuevo hogar y...». {n}Shairenkhei hace una pausa, preguntándose si debería continuar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Proscrita Yrliet, te traigo buenas noticias. Nuestros videntes han logrado contactar con los hijos del mundo astronave Alaitoc, y pronto tus camaradas proscritos visitarán esta parte de la galaxia que los mon-keigh llaman "la Extensión". Nos evacuarán, nos darán un nuevo hogar y...». {n}Shairenkhei no aparta su mirada de ti, preguntándose si debería continuar.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “流浪者伊莉耶特，我有个好消息要告诉你。我们的先知想办法联系到了方舟世界阿莱托克的子嗣。很快，你的流浪者同伴就会来到这个被猴子称为‘扩区’的星区。他们会带我们离开这里，给我们一个新家，然后……”{n}榭伦凯顿了顿，盯着你，思考着是否应该继续说下去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “流浪者伊莉耶特，我有个好消息要告诉你。我们的先知想办法联系到了方舟世界阿莱托克的子嗣。很快，你的流浪者同伴就会来到这个被猴子称为‘扩区’的星区。他们会带我们离开这里，给我们一个新家，然后……”{n}榭伦凯盯着你，思考着是否应该继续说下去。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Yrliet l'Errante, j'ai une bonne nouvelle à vous annoncer : nos Grands Prophètes ont réussi à contacter les enfants du vaisseau-monde Alaitoc. Bientôt, vos Errants arriveront dans ce secteur de la galaxie que les mon-keigh nomment "les Étendues". Ils nous emmèneront, nous donneront un nouveau monde et... » {n}Shairenkhei s'interrompt et continue de vous fixer du regard, se demandant s'il doit poursuivre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet l'Errante, j'ai une bonne nouvelle à vous annoncer : nos prophètes ont réussi à contacter les enfants du vaisseau-monde Alaitoc. Bientôt, leurs Errants arriveront dans ce secteur de la galaxie que les mon-keigh nomment "les Étendues". Ils nous emmèneront, nous donneront un nouveau monde et... » {n}Shairenkhei continue de vous fixer du regard, se demandant s'il doit poursuivre.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「追放者ユリエット、いい知らせがある。我々の先見司が方舟『アライトク』の御子らとコンタクトを取った。まもなく、お前の仲間の追放者が、モン＝ケイがエクスパンスと呼ぶ宙域に訪れるだろう。彼らは私たちを連れていき、新しい家を与え…」{n}シャイレンケイは視線をあなたに向けたまま、続けるべきかどうか逡巡する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「追放者ユリエット、いい知らせがある。我々の先見司が方舟『アライトク』の御子らとコンタクトを取った。まもなく、お前の仲間の追放者が、モン＝ケイがエクスパンスと呼ぶ宙域に訪れるだろう。彼らは私たちを連れていき、新しい家を与え…」{n}シャイレンケイは視線をあなたに向けたまま、続けるべきかどうか逡巡する。{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Ausgestoßene Yrliet, ich habe gute Neuigkeiten für Euch. Unseren Runenpropheten ist es gelungen, die Kinder des Weltenschiffs Alaitoc zu kontaktieren. Diese anderen Ausgestoßenen werden bald den Teil der Galaxie besuchen, den die Chem-Pan-Sey die Ausdehnung nennen. Sie werden uns mitnehmen, uns ein neues Zuhause geben und ..." {n}Shairenkhei bricht ab, hält seinen Blick auf dich gerichtet und fragt sich, ob er fortfahren soll.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ausgestoßene Yrliet, ich habe gute Neuigkeiten für Euch. Unseren Sehern ist es gelungen, die Kinder des Weltenschiffs Alaitoc zu kontaktieren. Diese anderen Ausgestoßenen werden bald den Teil der Galaxie besuchen, den die Chem-Pan-Sey die Ausdehnung nennen. Sie werden uns mitnehmen, uns ein neues Zuhause geben und ..." {n}Shairenkhei hält seinen Blick auf dich gerichtet und fragt sich, ob er fortfahren soll.{/n}
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Yurtsuz Yrliet, sana güzel haberlerim var. Ötesezenlerimiz, Alaitoc gemidünyasının çocuklarıyla iletişime geçmeyi başardı. Yurtsuz dostların, yakında mon-keighlerin Enginlik dediği galaksinin bu kısmına ziyarette bulunacaklar. Bizi yanlarında götürüp bize yeni bir yuva verecekler ve..." {n}Shairenkhei duraksıyor. Bakışlarını sana doğrultuyor ve devam edip etmemek konusunda kararsız kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Outcast Yrliet, I have some good news for you. Our Farseers managed to contact the children of Craftworld Alaitoc, and soon your fellow Outcasts will visit the part of the galaxy that the mon-keigh call the Expanse. They will take us away, give us a new home, and..." {n}Shairenkhei pauses, his gaze on you, wondering if he should continue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yurtsuz Yrliet, sana güzel haberlerim var. Ötesezenlerimiz, Alaitoc Gemidünyasının çocuklarıyla iletişime geçmeyi başardı. Yurtsuz dostların, yakında mon-keighlerin Enginlik dediği galaksinin bu kısmına ziyarette bulunacaklar. Bizi yanlarında götürüp bize yeni bir yuva verecekler ve..." {n}Shairenkhei duraksıyor. Bakışlarını sana doğrultarak devam edip etmeme konusunda kararsız kalıyor.{/n}
